threats.title: MITM attack
threats.description: Man in the middle attack where an attacker is able to capture all of the data the user is sending and receiving and pretend to be the user towards the website/pretend to be the website towards the user
threats.mitigation: Enforce use of HTTPS/TLS communication methods

threats.title: DOS attack on the webpages loading process
threats.description:
Overloading the webpage loading process with many HTTP requests.
By doing so the process crashes and the webpages are not loading/available.
threats.mitigation: Assigning a rate limiter firewall before the webpage process/Limitng the amount of requests the process can handle.

threats.title: Coding the webpage without proper privileages
threats.description: An attacker sends a request to up[date the code of the webpage
threats.mitigation: Provide strong authentication methods to ensure every request comes from a real app developer

threats.title: DOS attack on the login process
threats.description:
Overloading the Login process with many requests.
By doing so the process crashes and the and users are not able to login to the app.
threats.mitigation: Assigning a rate limiter firewall before the process/Limitng the amount of requests the process can handle.

threats.title: BOF attack
threats.description: Attacker send a special query which exploits a BOF volnuerability in the Login process which parses the query details
threats.mitigation: Secure coding methods + Code reviews + Penetration testing

threats.title: SQL injection
threats.description: Attacker sends a special query which exploits a SQL injection attack  and provides him elevated privileges/Allows him to lign as a different user.
threats.mitigation: Login process only uses parameterized queries  to access the Login DB

threats.title: DOS attack on the transaction process
threats.description:
Overloading the transaction process with many requests.
By doing so the process crashes and the uisers/tellers are not able to perform new transactions.
threats.mitigation: Assigning a rate limiter firewall before the process/Limitng the amount of requests the process can handle.

threats.title: Spoofing the identity of the requester
threats.description: Attacker creates new transaction from a victim account to his account
threats.mitigation: Strong authentication methods to ensure that the reqesters own the sender account

data.name: Coding
data.description: A web developer updates the webpage

threats.title: SQL injection
threats.description: Incoming requests which triggers the DB to output all records
threats.mitigation: Blocking requests which results in output with more then one row
